name: Voluntary Sector Solutions
overview:
VoluntarySectorHelp.co.uk is an online only consultancy providing services to the UK’s Voluntary Sector. We were established to support small charities & non profits as a 21st century alternative to the bureaucracy and expense of traditional consultants.

Through the use of technology and the internet we’ve cut the costs and time required to access and benefit from our team of professional consultants. Our website also allows us to work across the length and breadth of the UK as a result of being online.

VoluntarySectorHelp.co.uk provides downloadable products & documents and the ability to order, receive and pay for consultancy services online. We also write a regularly updated blog that provides free advice and tools covering funding & the Voluntary Sector.
